title: random dcs
body:
so i've been getting random dc's the last couple days 1 of those wouldnt let me reconnect but league was working perfectly fine
another was when i got dced in the enemy jungle right outside their base luckily i reconnected and killed orianna when she came up to me(this 1 was ranked) but i seriously dont wanna queue up for ranked and lose 18-20 lp because of some shitty riot API

replies.body:
That's a little odd that those matches wouldn't let you reconnect at all. Was that a case where you were trying to reconnect and it failed every time or did the reconnect button never appear at all?

If reconnecting just hasn't been working, it might be a sign that your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) could use a little attention. Even with your internet running perfectly fine, it doesn't mean that you might not still have issues getting connected to our servers specifically.

sometimes i get to exit out of the game and reconnect for 1 though it didnt let me reconnect so i just logged off to browse the internet and watch twitch since i couldnt do anything

the reconnect button was there but the loading screen was giving me an error message
also i must say extra my internet is PERFECTLY FINE when i get dced
